thread.title: First time visit to Stellenbosch
thread.title_full: First time visit to Stellenbosch - Review of Coopmanhuijs Boutique Hotel & Spa, Stellenbosch, South Africa - TripAdvisor

author: iainlreid1
title: First time visit to Stellenbosch
text: We were towards the end of our Cape adventure and really enjoyed our one night stay over in this hotel. Fabulous service and everyone so attentive. So well situated to walk and explore the centre. The only point I would warn first time travelers to Stellenbosch is the difficulty finding car park space. Hotels however do have a designated drop off car space and hotel will then park your car in nearby secure car park basement.
